application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of details pursuant to condition 4 (materials) of planning permission P2024/0711 dated 15/11/2024 (External refurbishment of the Printworks, Glasshouse, and Stables buildings including: erection of new/replacement rooftop plant equipment and enclosures; new/replaced entrances; façade additions, recladding and repairs; new hard and soft landscaping including external lighting at terrace and ground levels; and all associated and ancillary works.)
decision_conditions: 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.622 Rev P1 (Printworks Yorkway Entrance Lightbox Detail); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.624 Rev P2 (Printworks Yorkway Entrance Soffit Panelling Plan); 2146-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.620 Rev P1 (Proposed Printworks Yorkway Entrance); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.670 Rev P1 (Wharfdale Road Way Through Elevations); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.671 Rev P1 (Wharfdale Road Way Through Plan Details); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.672 Rev P1 (Wharfdale Road Way Through West Site Section Details); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.673 Rev P1 (Wharfdale Road Way Through Residential Side Section Details); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.681 Rev P1 (Railway Entrance Gate – Plan); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.682 Rev P1 (Railway Entrance Gate – Elevations); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.683 Rev P1 (Railway Entrance Gate – West Side Section Details); 2416-BG-ZZ-00-DR-A-21.684 Rev P1 (Railway Entrance Gate – Residential Side Section Details); Cover Letter.
